column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Korra says : " Ugh , I ca n't bend .
#Text=Those guys were chi blockers .
#Text=They 're Amon 's henchmen .
#Text=" Korra says : " Amon ?
#Text=That anti-bending guy with a mask ?
#Text=" Mako says : " Yeah , he 's the leader of the Equalists .
#Text=" Korra says : " What do they want with the Triple Threats ?
#Text=" Mako says : " Whatever it is , ca n't be good .
#Text=Urgh , ca n't believe Bolin got himself into this mess !
#Text=" Korra says : " Mako , we are going to save your brother .
#Text=I promise you that .
#Text=" Korra says : " We 've been out all night .
#Text=No sign of him .
#Text=" Mako says : " We 've got ta keep looking .
#Text=But where ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Huh !
#Text=I have an idea !
#Text=" Korra says : " The first day I got into town , I ran into an Equalist protester over there .
#Text=" Mako says : " And you think they 'll know where Bolin is ?
#Text=" Korra says : " It 's our only lead right now .
#Text=" Korra says : " So , why is Bolin running around with the Triple Threat Triad , anyway ?
#Text=" Mako says : " Well , we ... we used to do some work for them back in the day .
#Text=" Korra says : " What ?
#Text=Wha - Are you some kind of criminal ?
#Text=" Mako says : " No !
#Text=You do n't know what you 're talking about .
#Text=I just ran numbers for them and stuff .
#Text=We were orphans out on the street ; I did what I had to do to survive and protect my little brother .
#Text=" Korra says : " I 'm sorry .
#Text=It must have been really hard .
#Text=Can I ask what happened to your parents ?
#Text=" Mako says : " They were mugged , by a firebender .
#Text=He cut them down right in front of me .
#Text=I was eight .
#Text=" Korra says : " Mako ... " Mako says : " Bolin 's the only family I have left .
#Text=If anything happened to him ... "
